00021 class LearnerTagger {
00022  protected:
00023   LearnerTokenizer           *tokenizer_;
00024   FreeList<LearnerPath>      *path_freelist_;
00025   FeatureIndex               *feature_index_;
00026   scoped_string               begin__;

00028   const char                 *end_;

00035   bool connect(size_t, LearnerNode *);
00036   bool viterbi();
00037   bool buildLattice();
00038   bool initList();
00039  public:
00040   bool empty() const { return (len_ == 0); }
00041   void close() {}
00042   void clear() {}
00043   const char *what() { return what_.str(); }
00044 
00045   explicit LearnerTagger(): tokenizer_(0), path_freelist_(0),
00046                             feature_index_(0), begin_(0), end_(0), len_(0) {}
00047   virtual ~LearnerTagger() {}
00048 };
